fields.tooltipString:
@dictGold Renewed Flame Rift 
@cm3

@dictBlue Monster Fire Immunity is Sundered
Fire Resist -@dictLightBlue(90-70)@dictBlue%

1 of the following:
+@dictLightBlue(5-15)@dictBlue% to Fire Skill Damage
-@dictLightBlue(5-10)@dictBlue% to Enemy Fire Resistance

1 of the following:
+@dictLightBlue(5-10)@dictBlue% Faster Run/Walk
+@dictLightBlue(12-24)@dictBlue% Faster Hit Recovery
+@dictLightBlue(3-8)@dictBlue to all Attributes

1 of the following:
+@dictLightBlue(10-65)@dictBlue to Life
+@dictLightBlue(10-75)@dictBlue to Mana

1 of the following:
Magic Damage Reduced by @dictLightBlue(5-10)@dictBlue
Damage Reduced by @dictLightBlue(5-10)@dictBlue

1 of the following:
@dictLightBlue(14-25)@dictBlue% Better Chance of Getting Magic Items
@dictLightBlue(20-55)@dictBlue% Extra Gold from Monsters
